CustomField.description: This fields populates the Opportunity Close Date when the opportunity stage is close/won
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(pse__Opportunity__c)), ISPICKVAL(pse__Opportunity__r.StageName, "Closed Won") ), pse__Opportunity__r.CloseDate, null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If related opportunity stage is not close/won this field is null
CustomField.label: Booking Date
